name: gateway (Portkey-AI)
description: [项目级] A blazing fast AI Gateway with integrated guardrails. Route to 200+ LLMs, 50+ AI Guardrails with 1 fast & friendly API.。来源: https://github.com/Portkey-AI/gateway

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A blazing fast AI Gateway with integrated guardrails. Route to 200+ LLMs, 50+ AI Guardrails with 1 fast & friendly API.

来源: https://github.com/Portkey-AI/gateway
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 10652

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
Dockerfile
LICENSE
README.md
conf.example.json
conf.json
cookbook
cookbook/README.md
cookbook/getting-started
cookbook/guardrails
cookbook/integrations
cookbook/monitoring-agents
cookbook/providers
cookbook/use-cases
deployment.yaml
docker-compose.yaml
docs
docs/deploy-on-replit.md
docs/images

name: gateway/cookbook 模块
description: [模块级] gateway 项目的 cookbook 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/Portkey-AI/gateway

genes.title: cookbook 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: cookbook/
类型: source
文件数: 127

包含文件:
- cookbook/README.md
- cookbook/getting-started
- cookbook/getting-started/automatic-retries-on-failures.md
- cookbook/getting-started/enable-cache.md
- cookbook/getting-started/fallback-from-openai-to-azure.ipynb
- cookbook/getting-started/fallback-from-stable-diffusion-to-dall-e.ipynb
- cookbook/getting-started/gentle-introduction-to-portkey-gateway.ipynb
- cookbook/getting-started/image-generation.ipynb
- cookbook/getting-started/resilient-loadbalancing-with-failure-mitigating-fallbacks.md
- cookbook/getting-started/writing-your-first-gateway-config.md
